title: S1 Ep57: When Skeptics Clash w/ Alison Smith - Hr.1
itunes:title: When Skeptics Clash w/ Alison Smith - Hr.1
description: Alison Smith is the head of SAPS and is a diehard skeptic, she recently caught heat for writing an article about the Ghost Hunters TV show and their ghost hunting technique.  Tonight, she and Dave go head to head and debate about the world of paranormal TV and whether their investigative techniques are valid.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
